name: Ghost Hunter (ramjing)
description:
You want to be a ghost hunter (definitely not inspired by Ghostb******) for this year's Halloween. To prepare yourself, you bought a vacuum cleaner and reenact one of the scenes. Zucc as many ghosts as you can while dodging every ghost that comes near you. Good luck :)

WASDto moveLMBto suckRMBto shootSPACE
to start/restart/pause/resume NOTE : This game was made as my submission for Mini Jam 116: Ghost.
